mapper.select: select count(*) from MASTER_USER_INFO_TBL where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_BABY_INFO_TBL ( BABY_ID, TITLE, BABY_NAME, BABY_BIRTH, BABY_PHOTO, BABY_GENDER, ID ) VALUES ( 'dfff8ff41-9ds-4d163abf5d-70d9dse0e7s' ,#{ title },#{ baby_name },#{ baby_birth },#{ baby_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR },#{ baby_gender },#{ id } )
INSERT ALL INTO MASTER_USER_INFO_TBL (id, pw) VALUES( #{id}, #{pw} ) INTO MASTER_FAMILY_INFO_TBL (id, title, family_rels ) VALUES( #{id},#{title},#{family_rels} ) SELECT 1 from dual
